name: Buckets of Foam
description:
An interactive story written in Ink.

This is a very personal piece. It started out as an exercise to practice Ink while being stuck home during the pandemic, but quickly grew into something different. It's been a very hard year, where a lot of things I hoped for and looked forward to vanished into thin air. I needed to get some things off my chest, and those things turned into a story.

I hope you enjoy it.

Photos are from the A Place Without Bodies: Volume 1 pack, by Colin Spacetwinks
